summary.span: 表示可以承载于 中的文本框控件。

span.span: Represents a text box control that can be hosted in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是实现接口的一种特殊类型的 控件 ，允许它在 单元格处于编辑模式时承载于中。The class is a specialized type of control that implements the interface, allowing it to be hosted in a when the cell is in edit mode. 处理 事件，以在单元格进入编辑模式时对编辑控件执行自定义初始化。Handle the event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. 若要自定义控件的显示特性，请设置由属性返回的对象的属性， 而不是设置由属性返回的控件的属性 。To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此无参数的构造函数将 属性设置为 `false` 。This parameterless constructor sets the property to `false`. 应用程序代码通常不会显式创建此类的实例，因为当包含或创建时，将自动执行此类实例 。Application code typically won't explicitly create instances of this class, because this is performed automatically when the containing or is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在从 .NET Framework 4.7.2 开始重新编译为 .NET Framework 目标版本的应用程序中，才可以使用新的对象。The new object is only available in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2. 面向 .NET Framework 早期版本但在 .NET Framework 4.7.2 上运行的应用程序可以通过兼容性开关选择使用此功能。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 有关其他信息，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中辅助功能的新增功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).

summary.span: 获取或设置文本框控件的当前值的格式化表示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the text box control.

value.span: 表示此控件的当前值的对象。

span.span: An object representing the current value of this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含控件包含的实际数据。The property contains the actual data contained by the control. 数据是显示在控件文本框中的字符串。The data is the string shown in the text box of the control. 与此相反， 属性是此字符串的格式化表示形式。In contrast, the property is the formatted representation of this string. 由于文本框使用纯文本字符串，因此这两个属性本质上是相同的。Since a text box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.

summary.span: 获取或设置所属单元格的父行的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the owning cell's parent row.

value.span: 包含所属单元格的行的索引；如果没有所属行，则为 -1。

span.span: The index of the row that contains the owning cell; -1 if there is no owning row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列标题行的行索引为-1。The row index for the column headers row is -1. 共享行的行索引也是-1。The row index for a shared row is also -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本框控件的当前值是否已更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the text box control has changed.

value.span: 如果控件的值已更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将属性设置为 `true` 以指示所属单元格的值已更改，可能需要更新单元格以反映值的更改。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change in value. 所属单元或表会 `false` 在其自身更新后将此属性重置为。The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after it has updated itself. 初始化控件时，此属性设置为 `false` 。When the control is initialized, this property is set to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法确保忽略 ENTER 键，以便回车符和换行符不会存储在单元值中。This method ensures that the ENTER key is ignored so that carriage return and line feeds aren't stored in the cell value. 如果按下 CTRL + A，此方法还允许选择单元格内容。This method also allows the cell contents to be selected when CTRL+A is pressed.
